segments.text: This scene feels so familiar to me, almost nostalgic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, that puddle of water spreading across the floor is making me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake off this feeling that something terrible is about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is lost in her own world, completely naive to the risks piling up around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy stretching beyond his limits, and I can't help but feel a pang of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination to sneak those cookies is impressive, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that little girl, looking up at him with hope, adds to the weight of the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
